name: SkyCrypt Draconic Purple Theme
description:
A theme based around the purples of the End Dimension for SkyCrypt.
The background screenshot uses BSL Shaders version 7.1.04.1
Location is the entrance to the Dragon's Nest in Hypixel SkyBlock
additional_info:
Theme created by rainbowcraft2
V1 released September 24, 2020

V2 released September 25, 2020:
-Fixed a few bugs, added code to change the appearance of some features that were missing
-Theoretically fits better on bigger screen sizes (untested as my screen doesn't have a bigger size)
